testcase.classname: courseCreation | Create a Course at Winjigo website
testcase.name: user should be able to create a course on Winjigo website
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to home page............................................passed When user open courses page from left side navigation bar...................passed And user click on create course button and fill mandatory data..............passed Then user back to courses list page and assert that course title is displayed.passed
